info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 9:26AM EST until January 22 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Dorchester, Hampton, Inland Colleton, Allendale, Tidal Berkeley and Charleston Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light rain will transition to light freezing rain late this afternoon and persist through tonight. This will result in ice accumulation especially on elevated surfaces, including bridges and overpasses.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
